trans-unit.source: Activates glossar for the whole site.
trans-unit.target: Activates glossar for the whole site.

trans-unit.source: Add glossar to purge data in maintenance
trans-unit.target: Add glossar to purge data in maintenance

trans-unit.source: Glossar can be cleaned in the maintanance. You need to rebuild it after purge.
trans-unit.target: Glossar can be cleaned in the maintanance. You need to rebuild it after purge.

trans-unit.source: Terms will be used as headline if you do not use a headline in content.
trans-unit.target: Terms will be used as headline if you do not use a headline in content.

trans-unit.source: Plural search will find place, places and placeholder if term is called place.
trans-unit.target: Plural search will find place, places and placeholder if term is called place.

trans-unit.source: Content which is not shown to search, indexer::stop|continue
trans-unit.target: Content which is not shown to search, indexer::stop|continue

trans-unit.source: Exclude archives like news, events, faq,...
trans-unit.target: Exclude archives like news, events, faq,...

trans-unit.source: Deactivates the glossar cache. (Can be very slow)
trans-unit.target: Deactivates the glossar cache. (Can be very slow)

trans-unit.source: Do not use glosar with other languages
trans-unit.target: Do not use glosar with other languages

trans-unit.source: Contao will still use glossary with the user language.
trans-unit.target: Contao will still use glossary with the user language.

trans-unit.source: All terms between these tag will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: All terms between these tag will be ignored.

trans-unit.source: Those chars will be ignored in plural search. As example Contao(CMS) only Contao will be replaces if you set ( as illegal char.
trans-unit.target: Those chars will be ignored in plural search. As example Contao(CMS) only Contao will be replaces if you set ( as illegal char.

trans-unit.source: Maximum width of the preview layer.
trans-unit.target: Maximum width of the preview layer.

trans-unit.source: Maximum height for the preview layer.
trans-unit.target: Maximum height for the preview layer.

trans-unit.source: Default site if no page is selected.
trans-unit.target: Default site if no page is selected.
